verses.verse: וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> came unto Jeremiah שֵׁנִ֑ית <S%H8145><s%> the second וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> was still עָצ֔וּר <S%H6113><s%> time while he was yet shut up בַּחֲצַ֥ר <S%H2691><s%> in the court הַמַּטָּרָ֖ה <S%H4307><s%> of the prison לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עֹשָׂ֑הּ <S%H6213><s%> the maker יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> thereof the LORD יוֹצֵ֥ר <S%H3335><s%> that formed אוֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> לַהֲכִינָ֖הּ <S%H3559><s%> it to establish יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> it the LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name

קְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> Call אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me וְאֶעֱנֶ֑ךָּ <S%H6030><s%> unto me and I will answer וְאַגִּ֧ידָה <S%H5046><s%> thee and shew לְּךָ֛ גְּדֹל֥וֹת <S%H1419><s%> thee great וּבְצֻר֖וֹת <S%H1219><s%> and mighty things לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יְדַעְתָּֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> which thou knowest ס

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֨ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning בָּתֵּי֙ <S%H1004><s%> concerning the houses הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> of this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and concerning בָּתֵּ֖י <S%H1004><s%> and concerning the houses מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַנְּתֻצִ֕ים <S%H5422><s%> which are thrown down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הַסֹּלְל֖וֹת <S%H5550><s%> by the mounts וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against הֶחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> and by the sword

בָּאִ֗ים <S%H935><s%> They come לְהִלָּחֵם֙ <S%H3898><s%> to fight אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> with the Chaldeans וּלְמַלְאָם֙ <S%H4390><s%> but [it is] to fill אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with פִּגְרֵ֣י <S%H6297><s%> them with the dead bodies הָאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom הִכֵּ֥יתִי <S%H5221><s%> whom I have slain בְאַפִּ֖י <S%H639><s%> in mine anger וּבַחֲמָתִ֑י <S%H2534><s%> and in my fury וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom הִסְתַּ֤רְתִּי <S%H5641><s%> I have hid פָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> my face מֵהָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> from this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all רָעָתָֽם׃ <S%H7451><s%> and for all whose wickedness

הִנְנִ֧י <S%H2005><s%> behold מַעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> Behold I will bring לָּ֛הּ אֲרֻכָ֥ה <S%H724><s%> it health וּמַרְפֵּ֖א <S%H4832><s%> and cure וּרְפָאתִ֑ים <S%H7495><s%> and I will cure וְגִלֵּיתִ֣י <S%H1540><s%> them and will reveal לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> to them עֲתֶ֥רֶת <S%H6283><s%> unto them the abundance שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of peace וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> and truth

וַהֲשִֽׁבֹתִי֙ <S%H7725><s%> to return אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁב֣וּת <S%H7622><s%> And I will cause the captivity יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שְׁב֣וּת <S%H7622><s%> and the captivity יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבְנִתִ֖ים <S%H1129><s%> and will build כְּבָרִֽאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <S%H7223><s%> them as at the first

וְטִ֣הַרְתִּ֔ים <S%H2891><s%> And I will cleanse מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲוֹנָ֖ם <S%H5771><s%> them from all their iniquity אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָֽטְאוּ־ <S%H2398><s%> whereby they have sinned לִ֑י וְסָלַחְתִּ֗י <S%H5545><s%> against me and I will pardon [לְכֹול־ כ] (לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲוֹנֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H3605><s%> all ק) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָֽטְאוּ־ <S%H2398><s%> whereby they have sinned לִ֔י וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which פָּ֥שְׁעוּ <S%H6586><s%> and whereby they have transgressed בִֽי׃

וְהָ֣יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֗י לְשֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> And it shall be to me a name שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <S%H8342><s%> of joy לִתְהִלָּ֣ה <S%H8416><s%> a praise וּלְתִפְאֶ֔רֶת <S%H8597><s%> and an honour לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all גּוֹיֵ֣י <S%H1471><s%> before all the nations הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִשְׁמְע֜וּ <S%H8085><s%> which shall hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַטּוֹבָ֗ה <S%H2896><s%> all the good אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I עֹשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> that I do אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וּפָחֲד֣וּ <S%H6342><s%> unto them and they shall fear וְרָֽגְז֗וּ <S%H7264><s%> and tremble עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַטּוֹבָה֙ <S%H2896><s%> for all the goodness וְעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַשָּׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> and for all the prosperity אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָֽנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I עֹ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> that I procure לָּֽהּ׃ ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עוֹד֮ <S%H5750><s%> Yet יִשָּׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Again there shall be heard בַּמָּקוֹם־ <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּה֒ <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> of which אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> which ye say חָרֵ֣ב <S%H2720><s%> [shall be] desolate ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> without man וּמֵאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and without בְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and without beast בְּעָרֵ֤י <S%H5892><s%> [even] in the cities יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֣וֹת <S%H2351><s%> and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem הַֽנְשַׁמּ֗וֹת <S%H8074><s%> that are desolate מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without אָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> without man וּמֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and without יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> and without inhabitant וּמֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and without בְּהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> and without beast

ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The voice שָׂשׂ֞וֹן <S%H8342><s%> of joy וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice שִׂמְחָ֗ה <S%H8057><s%> of gladness ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice חָתָן֮ <S%H2860><s%> of the bridegroom וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice כַּלָּה֒ <S%H3618><s%> of the bride ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice אֹמְרִ֡ים <S%H559><s%> of them that shall say הוֹדוּ֩ <S%H3034><s%> Praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּ֔וֹ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy מְבִאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> [and] of them that shall bring תּוֹדָ֖ה <S%H8426><s%> the sacrifice of praise בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָשִׁ֧יב <S%H7725><s%> For I will cause to return אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁבוּת־ <S%H7622><s%> the captivity הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land כְּבָרִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> as at the first אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֒ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts ע֞וֹד <S%H5750><s%> will again יִֽהְיֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> Again in this place הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this הֶחָרֵ֛ב <S%H2720><s%> which is desolate מֵֽאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> else אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> without man וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> or בְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> and without beast וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרָ֑יו <S%H5892><s%> and in all the cities נְוֵ֣ה <S%H5116><s%> thereof shall be an habitation רֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> of shepherds מַרְבִּצִ֖ים <S%H7257><s%> to lie down צֹֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> causing [their] flocks

בְּעָרֵ֨י <S%H5892><s%> In the cities הָהָ֜ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains בְּעָרֵ֤י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities הַשְּׁפֵלָה֙ <S%H8219><s%> of the vale וּבְעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> and in the cities הַנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south וּבְאֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and in the land בִּנְיָמִ֛ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וּבִסְבִיבֵ֥י <S%H5439><s%> and in the places about יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem וּבְעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> and in the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עֹ֣ד <S%H5750><s%> will again תַּעֲבֹ֧רְנָה <S%H5674><s%> pass again הַצֹּ֛אן <S%H6629><s%> shall the flocks עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> under יְדֵ֥י <S%H3027><s%> under the hands מוֹנֶ֖ה <S%H4487><s%> of him that telleth אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> [them] saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> Behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַהֲקִֽמֹתִי֙ <S%H6965><s%> that I will perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> thing הַטּ֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> that good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֛רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> which I have promised אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and to the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

בַּיָּמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> In those days הָהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> those וּבָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> and at that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he אַצְמִ֥יחַ <S%H6779><s%> to grow up לְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David צֶ֣מַח <S%H6780><s%> will I cause the Branch צְדָקָ֑ה <S%H6666><s%> of righteousness וְעָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> and he shall execute מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> and righteousness בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

בַּיָּמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> In those days הָהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> those תִּוָּשַׁ֣ע <S%H3467><s%> be saved יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> shall Judah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem תִּשְׁכּ֣וֹן <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> safely וְזֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> and this אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> and this [is the name] wherewith she shall be called לָ֖הּ יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צִדְקֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H6664><s%> prosperity ס

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall never יִכָּרֵ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> want לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> to sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֥א <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְלַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> Neither shall the priests הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall never יִכָּרֵ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> want אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man מִלְּפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> before מַעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> me to offer עוֹלָ֜ה <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וּמַקְטִ֥יר <S%H6999><s%> and to kindle מִנְחָ֛ה <S%H4503><s%> meat offerings וְעֹֽשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and to do זֶּ֖בַח <S%H2077><s%> sacrifice כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> continually ס
וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> came unto Jeremiah לֵאמֽוֹר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תָּפֵ֙רוּ֙ <S%H6565><s%> If ye can break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֣י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> of the day וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֖י <S%H1285><s%> and my covenant הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> of the night וּלְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> because הֱי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become יֽוֹמָם־ <S%H3119><s%> and that there should not be day וָלַ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night בְּעִתָּֽם׃ <S%H6256><s%> in their season
